article_title: Obama says volunteers in Ebola fight need support, not restrictions
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: obama, says, volunteers, ebola, fight, need, support, not, restrictions

og.description: President Barack Obama said on Tuesday that health workers volunteering to help treat Ebola patients in West Africa should be applauded.
og.title: Pres. Obama Says Ebola Volunteers Need Support, Not Restrictions
